FOUND IN: Apex experience: The highest point in an individual's life, characterized by accomplishments and growth.
Shariah court: A legal institution that adjudicates disputes and issues rulings based on Islamic law according to fiqh principles.
Phobophobia (fear of phobias) - An unusual but valid form of anxiety where one develops a fear of having various phobias themselves
Flamenco-Cante Jondo: A subgenre of flamenco, characterized by deep emotion and intricate guitar playing combined with traditional Gypsy song forms.
